# Board of Zoning Appeals

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1280 TTY 711

__

bzaclerkmail@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Pkwy, Suite 801  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Clerk  
Board of Zoning Appeals

## Previous Minute Books

We are in the process of scanning additional minute books, and they will be added to this page as they are completed. (Please also note that these are large files and as such may take some time to load).
